channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by EMG for Rai 3, 27 June 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Movimento 5 Stelle (NI): 16.9–20.5%
  • Partito Democratico (S&D): 21.5–25.3%
  • Lega Nord (ID): 33.6–38.0%
  • Forza Italia (EPP): 7.2–9.7%
  • Fratelli d’Italia (ECR): 5.5–7.8%
  • Liberi e Uguali (S&D): 1.4–2.7%
  • Più Europa (RE): 2.2–3.7%
